title: Sketched into history
caption: 'World in Progress' by artist Saype in Geneva, Switzerland
copyright: Artist Saype poses with his land art painting at UN Headquarters, Geneva, Switzerland (© Valentin Flauraud/EPA-EFE/Shutterstock)
description: If you think art belongs only on walls, Swiss-–French artist Saype would like to draw your attention elsewhere—to the ground beneath your feet. In Geneva, Switzerland, he turned an ordinary patch of grass into an extraordinary message with his art, 'World in Progress,' which is featured in today's image. Look more closely, and you'll spot the artist himself posing with his artwork.
